about_the_game:
In addition to 500 VC, the Bargain Bundle delivers exceptional value with an extra 250 bonus VC and a tactical urban ghillie suit. Perfect for players looking to upgrade their look and enhance their in-game experience, this bundle provides cosmetic gear at a great price. Ideal for those seeking better camouflage and the best bang for their buck.

Take advantage of this offer to get your hands on:

- One (1) City Rat Uniform: An urban ghillie suit.

- 500 Premium Credits: For use in the in-game store.

- 250 Premium Credits (Bonus): For use in the in-game store.
